name: Star Paladin Cross
descriptions: Star Paladin Cross is a member of the Brotherhood of Steel residing in the Capital Wasteland in Fallout 3. She is a possible companion of the Lone Wanderer.

It is well known among the Brotherhood's members that Cross is actually a cyborg; she no longer has a need to eat or sleep. This was the result of Scribe Reginald Rothchild performing an operation in order to save her life after she was gravely wounded while protecting Elder Owyn Lyons in the past.

Sometime after the Brotherhood arrived in the Capital Wasteland, they were approached to provide protection for the scientists of Project Purity; Cross in particular helped to guard the endeavor from when it was in its infancy in 2257. However, following the death of a lead scientist, Catherine, in childbirth, the progress ground to a halt. With super mutant attacks increasing,

By 2277, Cross' service to the Brotherhood has led to her achieving the rank of star paladin as well as holding the title of Keeper of the ARM. She primarily acts as seneschal (steward) to Elder Lyons.

Being the second highest-ranked soldier in the Brotherhood (behind Sentinel Sarah Lyons), Cross answers only to the elder, who has given her leave to pursue Project Purity's restoration as she sees fit.
In traveling with the Lone Wanderer, Cross can express how she knew James well;
† Cross wears a unique variant of power armor, editor ID FollowersOutfitCross, form ID 00066c73, though it does not have better statistics than any other power armor and is simply called power armor.
Star Paladin Cross appears in Fallout 3, Fallout Shelter, Fallout Shelter Online, and Fallout: Wasteland Warfare.

topics.topic_text: We must part ways, Paladin Cross.
topics.response_text: Are you certain?

topics.topic_text: On second thought, stay with me.
topics.response_text: Very well. I shall stay with you.

topics.topic_text: We must part ways, Paladin Cross.
topics.response_text: Very well. I shall return to my duties at the Citadel should you require my aid once again.

topics.topic_text: You knew my father?
topics.response_text: I did. And you as well!

topics.topic_text: I loved him so much. I'll never forget him.
topics.response_text: And so our deeds are carried on through our sons and our daughters.

topics.topic_text: Go ahead.
topics.response_text: I escorted your father across the Wastes. It was the best I could contribute to his efforts to restore fresh water to the people.

topics.topic_text: I don't suppose I could stop you.
topics.response_text: Wry. Much like James was.

topics.topic_text: Why does it matter how a man dies? Death is death.
topics.response_text: True. And in the end, death claims us all. But how we die can say just as much about our lives as how we lived.

topics.topic_text: He died as he lived. A selfish asshole.
topics.response_text: Then you did not know the man. I knew your father, I knew his goodness, and I will not have you sully the memory of a noble man.

topics.topic_text: What about the Enclave?
topics.response_text: As a Star Paladin, I answer only to Elder Lyons. He has given me leave to pursue the restoration of Project Purity as I see fit.

topics.topic_text: I would be honored, Star Paladin Cross.
topics.response_text: Then I shall follow your leave and submit to your command.

topics.topic_text: Perhaps later.
topics.response_text: Certainly. I shall remain here. Should you change your mind, simply return to me. I shall come with you for the asking.

topics.topic_text: I would like your assistance once again, Paladin Cross.
topics.response_text: It is regrettable, but I cannot follow one such as you. Restore your good name, and perhaps I shall reconsider.

topics.topic_text: Let's get going.
topics.response_text: Very well. I stand by your side.

topics.topic_text: Not just yet. I wanted to talk to you about something.
topics.response_text: What do you wish to speak to me about?

topics.topic_text: I just wanted to make sure you were still here. Goodbye.
topics.response_text: As I am a "man of my word", there is nowhere else that I could possibly be.

topics.topic_text: Star Paladin Cross, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
topics.response_text: My friend... It's been my pleasure accompanying you, but we both know this is your fight to finish. Stay strong, and honor your father's memory.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about your tactics.
topics.response_text: I am open to your suggestions.

topics.topic_text: I want you to change your combat style.
topics.response_text: A member of the Brotherhood is trained in all weapons as an Initiate. What do you wish?

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: If conversation is what you wish, perhaps you should have brought along a Scribe.{Chuckling warmly.}

topics.topic_text: That's all. Let's get going.
topics.response_text: I shall remain vigilant.

topics.topic_text: I like what you're doing. Stick with the melee.
topics.response_text: I appreciate the compliment. It is where I am most comfortable.

topics.topic_text: You're not bad with a ranged weapon. Keep it up.
topics.response_text: The same can be said of any Brother. We are trained well and tempered in the fires of battle.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
topics.response_text: I am open to your suggestions.

topics.topic_text: You're good where you are.
topics.response_text: I thought it so.

topics.topic_text: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: As the Codex says: "Through discourse, we gain the strength of our Brothers' minds."

topics.topic_text: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
topics.response_text: Should you require advice, I am here.

topics.topic_text: Keep hanging back.
topics.response_text: I've had no compelling reason to do anything different from what you asked.

topics.topic_text: Enough about tactics.
topics.response_text: It is always a subject worthy of discussion.

topics.topic_text: Let's trade equipment.
topics.response_text: In the words of Elder Theis: "A Brother well equipped is a Brother keeping to his duty."

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: I shall reflect on the battles past and the battles to come until your return.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: I am disappointed that things have come to this.
